name: Love Self (kidpsychic)
description:
Inspired by "All About Love" by Bell Hooks, Love Self is a game vision of what it could feel like spreading love as a verb. 

Use WASD to move, space to jump, left click to shoot and retract your heart, and right click to love yourself (which you’ll need to do if you get yelled at too much!)

made with 

@deinlenz
